name: Mealzfit
oneLiner: Healthy, homely, and fitness-focused meals made fresh—no subscriptions. Order on Swiggy or Zomato.

testimonials.name: Mohammed Riaz
testimonials.text: Mealzfit is my post-gym savior—high protein, zero hassle, and tastes better than cheat meals!

testimonials.name: Afreen Begum
testimonials.text: Finally, a brand that serves homely food—feels like eating at my mom's place.

testimonials.name: Faraz Ahmed
testimonials.text: As a diabetic, Mealzfit makes life easier. Tasty food that doesn't mess with my sugar levels. Love it!

testimonials.name: Arshad Ali
testimonials.text: Excellent service and delicious healthy meals. Perfect for my family's nutritional needs!

faqs.question: How fresh are your meals?
faqs.answer: All our meals are prepared fresh daily using the finest ingredients. We prioritize quality and freshness in every dish we serve.

faqs.question: Are your diabetic meals doctor-approved?
faqs.answer: Yes, our diabetic-friendly meals are designed with low-GI ingredients and have been reviewed by nutrition experts to support healthy blood sugar levels.

faqs.question: What's the protein content in fitness meals?
faqs.answer: Our fitness meals typically contain 25-35g of high-quality protein per serving, perfect for muscle recovery and growth.

faqs.question: Which areas do you deliver to?
faqs.answer: Currently, we serve all major areas in Hyderabad through Swiggy and Zomato. Check the apps for availability in your specific location.

faqs.question: Do you have allergen-free options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer various allergen-free options. Please check individual item descriptions or contact us for specific dietary requirements.
